title: Ruins
description: Possible rewards that ancient ruins give.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the ruins. Must be distinct.

notification.title: Notification
notification.description: Notification added to the user when this reward is chosen. If omitted, an empty notification is shown. Some notifications may have parameters.
examples: We have found survivors in the ruins! Population added to [cityName].
We have discovered the lost technology of [techName] in the ruins!
Our unit finds advanced weaponry hidden in the ruins!
We have found a crudely-drawn map in the ruins!

weight.title: Weight
weight.description: Relative weight this reward is chosen next.

color.title: Color
color.description: The color used for the reward in the Civilopedia (e.g. #FFA040)

excludedDifficulties.title: Excluded Difficulties
excludedDifficulties.description: A list of all difficulties on which this reward may not be awarded.
